captions.text:
Hi, it's Karena, and welcome to your Love
Your Body series. Today, we are doing Love

Your Arms. So grab some weights and let's
get going. First move, we're going to come

down into a wide squat while we curl. And
while down here, punch to each side and come

back up. Of course, we are still working multiple
muscle groups, because we like to be as efficient

as we can. And punch. Now remember, through
the whole series, go to Toneitup.com to stay

up-to-date, and we are gifting Victoria's
Secret gift packs all throughout the series

until Valentine's Day. And last one. Alright,
next, we are going to take a wide step out

to the side into what will soon be a Warrior
2 Lunge. And then as you lunge, you bend your

front leg forward, but don't go out past your
toes, and you'll row up at the same time,

coming into the Warrior 2 position. And then
tricep extension, come back, and straighten

and lower your weights. And again. So for
this one, we are working our shoulders and

our triceps, giving you nice, sexy, sleek
arms. Abs are tight. A few more here. Now

we'll keep our foot position the same, and
we're going to come into a Swaying Angel.

So we're also working our waistline with this
move. So bring your arms overhead and straighten.

A few more here. Last one. And now we work
the other side. So, Warrior 2 position, ready

and row and triceps. Last one. Now straighten
that front leg, and Swaying Angel. And last

one. Alright, now we're going to work our
back, so we can wear those backless dresses

for Valentine's Day. So we're coming down,
bending at the hips, knees are slightly bent,

and we are going to row up. And then use one
weight at a time, so alternating sides, really

squeeze your back muscles together. And now
we are going to advance this move, if you

want to, and we're adding -- we're going to
work the backs of the legs. So it's going

to be Single Leg Double Row. So bend forward,
row back. Abs are engaged. Nice, slow and

steady. And 3, 2 and last one. Alright, beautiful
job. Now you can do that routine three more

times through if you want to, and add on your
Secret Admirer Cardio routine. And everything

is at the printable link below. We'll see
you beauties at the next workout.

title: Love Your Arms Routine With Karena! | Tone It Up Love Your Body Series
